src.description: The source URL of the image to be displayed.

name.description: Displays the initials if the image is not provided or fails to load.

icon.description: Displays a custom icon inside the avatar.

fallback.description: A custom fallback component to display when the image fails to load.

isBordered.description: If `true`, adds a border around the avatar.

isDisabled.description: If `true`, disables the avatar and applies a disabled styling.

isFocusable.description: If `true`, makes the avatar focusable for keyboard navigation.

showFallback.description: If `true`, shows the fallback icon or initials when the image fails to load.

ImgComponent.description: The component to be used as the image element.

imgProps.description: Props to be passed to the image element.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the avatar slots.
